Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

The Caveman let out some more grunts. He could understand them, though he 
didn't know how. He made some gestures and grunted some more. He pointed to his 
hammer and laid it on the ground, then picked it up again.

--part1_ac.47f90fc1.2ca38ae0_boundary
